description: Monitor the execution of the ```launchctl``` command, focusing on subcommands such as ```load```, ```unload```, and ```start``` that may be used by adversaries to load Launch Agents or Launch Daemons. Note: This analytic monitors the execution of the launchctl command and its key subcommands. Exclude known administrative users to minimize false positives. Analytic 1 - Suspicious Launchctl sourcetype=macOS:unified OR sourcetype=osquery OR sourcetype=auditd | search command IN ("launchctl load", "launchctl unload", "launchctl start")
